message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.CY, cs.HC 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the organization of expectations and the self-organization of sciences as systems of rationalized expectations, which are topics related to social informatics (cs.SI) and systems and control (cs.SY). The use of incursive and hyper-incursive equations from the computation of anticipatory systems suggests a connection to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and cybernetics (cs.CY). Finally, the discussion of the feedback between historical social structures and the emerging horizons of meaning suggests a connection to human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
